document_data.mainbody:
Marcus was a middle-aged fisherman from the Chionthar Valley, whose life was cut short in the late 15 century DR.
Marcus was an aging human man with a balding head of red hair. At the time of his death, Marcus wore a blue tunic and simple short pants.
In the , a spelljammer squid ship crashed into the shores of the River Chionthar. Marcus along with several other poor souls, witnessed the crash and rushed towards the site, looking to help the survivors. He saw a beautiful black-haired elven lass run from the crash, one of the survivors â€“ the woman named Shadowheart. Unfortunately, the elf was not the only one to survive. While Marcus was distracted by a beautiful woman, he was jumped and murdered by intellect devourers who were onboard the magical vessel. The fishermans body was left on the beach by the burning spelljammer.
